Posts.Content: nana_of_3 wrote: I just foundout I have early stage breast cancer. Dont the needle biop. the dr . wants to start me on a high dose of oral chemo. Has anyone taking this kind of chemo before . Heard it could make your hair fallout . Also any information  would be helpful . I really dont understand when the dr says  " as long as your blood work readings look good " what should I be cancerned about ? Whats concerned good or bad ? To be honest this is so over welming I just want to prented theres nothing wrong , and just ignor it . Thanks for any help you can offer Tina Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: just found out and really need help nana_of_3 Shirlann
